title: Newly remodeled 2 bed / 1 bath with upgrades galore!
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Residences on Bedford!', 'Located at:', '1425 Bedford St', 'Stamford, CT 06905', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 2', '# of Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 922 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $2240 - $2436/month', 'Contact our leasing office at (203) 208-3262', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'At The Residences on Bedford, our mission is to make home synonymous with luxury.', 'Our charming apartment community in Stamford features contemporary finishes, eye-catching kitchens, and spacious living areas, providing you the convenience of an apartment and comfort of a home.', 'Plus, our Stamford apartment complex features resort-style amenities and a central location to make living feel like luxury.', "We're proudly accepting new tenants.", 'Contact us today!', 'Community Features:', '● 24 Hour Convenience Store', '● Bowling Alley', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Fitness Center', '● Gas Grills', '● On-Site Park', '● Parks Nearby', '● Pet Friendly', '● Play Area', '● 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '● Beautiful Picnic Areas', '● Close to Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '● Elegant Clubroom', '● Free Wi-Fi access in Common Areas', '● Ice Skating Rink **Winter Only', '● Laundry Facilities on Every Floor', '● Near Downtown Stamford', '● Online Payments Available', 'Unit Features:', '● Abundant Closet Space', '● Air Conditioning', '● All Units Come With Brand New Hardwood Floors!', '● Balcony', '● Blinds', '● Garage', '● Heating', '● Large, Private Balconies', '● Stainless Steel appliances in Select Units', '● Storage Units', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', '(203) 208-3262', 'Pet Policy:', 'We charge a $500 non-refundable fee for each pet.', 'We also charge $75 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight Limit: 35 lbs.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'Leasing Options:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management:', 'JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'C6602F0AEC2F4B']
